BBK01.SUD237: New business (volumes) of German banks / Loans to non-financial corporations up to EUR 0.25 million, with floating rate or initial rate fixation up to 3 months

General: Estimated. The volume of new business is extrapolated to form the underlying total using the Horvitz-Thompson estimator. The amount refers to the single loan transaction considered as new business. Excluding overdrafts. p = Provisional
